per_frame_1=wave_r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(6*time);
per_frame_2=wave_g = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(4.1*time);
per_frame_3=wave_b = -1 + (1-wave_r + 1-wave_g);
per_frame_4=warp = 0;
per_frame_5=//echo_zoom = echo_zoom + 0.2*sin(bass_att);
per_pixel_1=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_2=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.045*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_3=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.045*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=
per_pixel_6=a = 3*sin(1-rad*2*cos(abs(dx_r*(0.75*sin(time)-rad))));
per_pixel_7=b = abs(tan(cos(sin(12*rad))));
per_pixel_8=c = 8*(dx_r*dy_r/2)*sin(12*ang);
per_pixel_9=
per_pixel_10=rot = rot + abs(c*dx_r*(b+a));
per_pixel_11=zoom = zoom + dx_r*(a*b) + abs(2*dy_r*b);
per_pixel_12=dx = dx + c;
per_pixel_13=sw = ang/6.2832 + 1;
per_pixel_14=sw = sw*8;
per_pixel_15=
per_pixel_16=bl = equal(int(sw)%2,0);
per_pixel_17=sw = sw - int(sw);
per_pixel_18=sw = if(bl,sw,1-sw)*3;
per_pixel_19=
per_pixel_20=
per_pixel_21=rd = pow(rad*.8,.9);
per_pixel_22=rd = rd*6.2832*2 - (q2+sw)*3;
per_pixel_23=zm = .01 + .01*sin(rd);
per_pixel_24=
per_pixel_25=dx = (x-.5)*zm;
per_pixel_26=dy = (y-.5)*zm;
warp_1=`#define sampler_pic sampler_rand00
warp_2=`sampler2D sampler_pic;
warp_3=`
warp_4=`shader_body
warp_5=`{
warp_6=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_7=`
warp_8=`    // ERROR DIFFUSION DITHER - looks great
warp_9=`    float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw + rand_frame.xy;
warp_10=`    ret += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5)/256.0*1;
warp_11=`
warp_12=`    // mix in img...
warp_13=`    float3 pic = tex2D(sampler_pic, uv_orig).xyz;
warp_14=`    float lum = lum(pic);
warp_15=`    float use_it = abs(lum - frac(time*0.2));
warp_16=`    use_it = saturate(1 - use_it*33);
warp_17=`    ret = lerp(ret, pic, use_it.xxx);
warp_18=`
warp_19=`    // darken over time
warp_20=`    //ret -= 0.004;
warp_21=`    //ret *= 0.99;
warp_22=`    ret *= 0.97 + 0.03*saturate( length(uv - uv_orig)*200 );  // center only
warp_23=`}
warp_24=`
comp_1=`float3 ret1, ret2, reta;
comp_2=`float2 sam;
comp_3=`shader_body
comp_4=`{
comp_5=`    sam = tex2D(sampler_main,uv*.5);
comp_6=`    ret1 = tex2D(sampler_main, float2(uv.x, uv.y));
comp_7=`    sam *= GetBlur1(uv)-GetBlur3(uv);       
comp_8=`
comp_9=`    reta = tex2D(sampler_main, sam+uv ).rgb;
comp_10=`    ret1 = reta.r * (.5*bass_att*uv_orig.y+reta) + (reta.r)*ret1;
comp_11=`    ret1 *= (ret1+1)/2; //gamma
comp_12=`
comp_13=`uv = (uv-.5)*.3+.5;
comp_14=`    sam = tex2D(sampler_main,uv*.5);
comp_15=`    ret2 = tex2D(sampler_main, float2(uv.x, uv.y));
comp_16=`    sam *= GetBlur1(uv)-GetBlur3(uv);       
comp_17=`
comp_18=`    reta = tex2D(sampler_main, sam+uv ).rgb;
comp_19=`    ret2 = reta.r * (.5*bass_att*uv_orig.y+reta) + (reta.r)*ret2;
comp_20=`    ret2 *= (ret1+1); //gamma
comp_21=`
comp_22=`
comp_23=`
comp_24=`ret = max(ret1, ret2);
comp_25=`ret *= .5+.5*lum(ret);
comp_26=`//ret = (1+ret1)*ret2;
comp_27=`ret=1-ret;
comp_28=`}
comp_29=`
comp_30=`
